TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlImage extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Provides programmatic access for the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此控制項在網頁上顯示影像。Use this control to display an image on a Web page. 控制項可以用程式設計方式操作來變更顯示的影像、 影像大小，以及相對於其他頁面項目影像的對齊方式。The control can be programmatically manipulated to change the image displayed, the image size, and the alignment of the image relative to other page elements. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式修改的屬性負責控制何時按下。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically modify the properties of an control when an is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||「 Img"常值字串。The "img" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何建立和初始化的新執行個體控制項。The following code example illustrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/CS/htmlimagectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlImageCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlImageCtor/VB/htmlimagectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Align { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Align : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定影像相對於其他 Web 網頁項目的對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

value.span: 字串，指定影像相對於其他 Web 網頁項目的對齊方式。

span.span: A string that specifies the alignment of the image relative to other Web page elements.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此屬性可以用於在網頁上指定相對於其他項目影像的對齊方式。Use this property to specify the alignment of the image with respect to other elements on the Web page. 下表代表可能的值。The following table represents the possible values. |值Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |左left|網頁的左邊對齊映像。The image is aligned on the left side of the Web page.| |centercenter|影像是網頁的置中對齊。The image is aligned in the center of the Web page.| |向右right|影像網頁的右邊對齊。The image is aligned on the right side of the Web page.| |上top|在網頁中的其他項目與映像的上邊緣對齊。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the top edge of the image.| |中間middle|在網頁中的其他項目對齊與映像的中間。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the middle of the image.| |下bottom|在網頁中的其他項目與映像的下邊緣對齊。Other elements in the Web page are aligned with the bottom edge of the image.| > [!NOTE] > 所有瀏覽器，可能無法運作之中間值。The center value might not work on all browsers. 若要置映像，包裝包含段落標記內的控制項`align`屬性設為`"center"`(`

`)。To center an image, wrap the control inside paragraph tags that contain the `align` attribute set to `"center"` (`

`). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以在網頁上指定影像的對齊方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the alignment of an image on a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何藉由包裝中心網頁上的影像段落標記內控制項`align`屬性設為`"center"`。The following code example demonstrates how to center an image on the Web page by wrapping the control inside paragraph tags with the `align` attribute set to `"center"`. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Align Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Align Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Alt { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Alt : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定瀏覽器在沒有影像或目前正在下載而尚未完成時，要顯示的替代標題。

span.span: Gets or sets the alternative caption the browser displays if an image is unavailable or currently downloading and not yet finished.

value.span: 字串，包含瀏覽器的替代標題，以備沒有影像時使用。

span.span: A string that contains the alternative caption for the browser to use when the image is unavailable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定所指定的映像時顯示的標題屬性是無法使用。Use this property to specify the caption displayed when the image specified by the property is unavailable. 在較新的瀏覽器，此標題也會顯示為工具提示。On newer browsers, this caption also appears as a ToolTip. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要顯示所指定的映像的標題屬性是無法使用。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the caption to display when the image specified by the property is unavailable. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Border { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Border : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定影像框架 (Frame) 的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of a frame for an image.

value.span: 影像框架的寬度 (以像素為單位)。

span.span: The width (in pixels) of a frame for an image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定寬度 （以像素為單位） 的映像建立框架。Use this property to create a frame with the specified width (in pixels) for an image. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定在寬度為 5 像素框架控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a frame with a width of 5 pixels for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Border Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Border Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Height { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Height : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定影像的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可以用兩種方式。The and properties can be used two ways. 您可以使用和屬性，將映像大小規格傳送至瀏覽器。You can use the and properties to send image size specifications to the browser. 這會顯示在網頁快因為瀏覽器不需要重新計算頁面上元素的位置載入影像時。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 您也可以使用和來縮放影像的屬性。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 使用不同的映像的實體大小的值時，影像會據以調整大小。When using values different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 不過，這個方法來縮放影像不建議因為花較長時間來顯示網頁。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反地，實際大小調整影像大小所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 根據預設，屬性表示單位為像素，但它也以視窗大小的百分比表示。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the size of the window. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式修改顯示影像的高度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the height of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderAttributes(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

param.name: writer
param.span: ，包含在用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

span.span: The that contains the output stream to render on the client.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果值屬性是格式不正確的 URL，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the value of the property is a malformed URL, the method throws an exception. 方法會覆寫基底類別的方法寫入`src`屬性呈現的控制項。The method overrides the base class's method to write the `src` attribute of the rendered control. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法中自訂的伺服器控制項，以便特定替代文字，可存取的工具提示，一律會顯示與控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that specific alternative text, accessible as a ToolTip, is always displayed with the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributesvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/CS/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlImageRenderAttributes/VB/custom_htmlimage_renderattributes.vb#2)]

exception.span: 屬性包含不正確的 URL。

span.span: The property contains a malformed URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Src { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Src : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要顯示的影像檔來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the source of the image file to display.

value.span: 字串，含有要顯示的影像檔的路徑。

span.span: A string that contains the path to an image file to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來指定要顯示的影像檔案的路徑。Use this property to specify the path to the image file to display. 如果映像檔是與使用它的網頁原始程式檔相同的目錄中，您可以只指定檔案名稱。If the image file is in the same directory as the Web page source file that uses it, you can just specify the file name. 否則，您也必須包含檔案的路徑。Otherwise, you must also include the path to the file. 路徑可以是絕對或相對路徑包含網頁的來源檔案的目錄。The path can be absolute or relative to the directory that contains the Web page source file. 您可以使用相對路徑" `~/` "來參照目前頁面所在的虛擬目錄。You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located. 例如，值如``"XspTest 」 中的頁面上的虛擬目錄是``。For example, the value of for `` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is ``. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在網頁的原始程式檔相同的目錄中顯示的影像檔。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in the same directory as the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來指定要在不同的目錄，從網頁原始程式檔中顯示的影像檔。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify an image file to display in a different directory from the Web page source file. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/CS/source2cs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Src Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Src Example/VB/source2vb.aspx#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int Width { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Width : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定影像的寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the image.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可以用兩種方式。The and properties can be used two ways. 您可以使用和屬性，將映像大小規格傳送至瀏覽器。You can use the and properties to send the image size specifications to the browser. 這會顯示在網頁快因為瀏覽器不需要重新計算頁面上元素的位置載入影像時。This displays the Web page faster because the browser does not need to recalculate the positions of elements on the page when the image loads. 您也可以使用和來縮放影像的屬性。You can also use the and properties to scale the image. 使用不同的映像的實體大小的值時，影像會據以調整大小。When using values that are different from the physical size of the image, the image is resized accordingly. 不過，這個方法來縮放影像不建議因為花較長時間來顯示網頁。However, this method for scaling the image is not recommended because it takes longer for the page to display it. 相反地，實際大小調整影像大小所需的大小。Instead, physically resize the image to the size you need. 根據預設，屬性表示單位為像素，但它也以視窗大小的百分比表示。By default, the property is expressed in pixels, but it can also be expressed as a percentage of the window size. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式修改顯示影像的寬度。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically modify the width of the displayed image. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlImage.Height Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlImage.Height Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
